column5: HZNP Horizon Pharma HZNP 2435 was the months biggest loser descending 11 Expect a Downtrend reversal tickeroncomappnewsSearch
HZNP falling wedge on 30 min chart

HZNP Shorts are having a field day Technical charts may not be terrific but fundamentals for HZNP are solid Market uses tariffs and other irrelevant hysteria to drive down share prices of companies that have no involvement with China or Mexico Long term HZNP is a winner and those selling at the current prices may come to regret it later This is a buying opportunityfiguring out entry point could be tricky however
